description:
Celena Cross is young, incredibly sexy, and has the
tightest, hottest, most nubile body around. She comes
to Hogtied for her first bondage experience and
unfortunately discovers this type of thing is not for
her. Hogtied is a lot of things and one of those
things is honesty, so while Celena managed to struggle
though her first three scenes we decided to call the
shoot. She gave it her best and suffered a lot for
someone at her level, but this kind of thing was just
not for her.
Incidentally, we were shooting a BEHIND KINK story
that followed her the entire day because we wanted to
capture the real story of an inexperienced girl doing
hogtied. I have included that episode of BEHIND KINK
as an addition bonus so you can see what went on
behind the camera. Think of it as our little Christmas
gift to you.
title: Celena Cross
